property.name: dfs.datanode.address
property.description: The datanode server address and port for data transfer. The default is 0.0.0.0:50010

property.name: dfs.datanode.http.address
property.description: The datanode http server address and port. The default is 0.0.0.0:50075

property.name: dfs.datanode.ipc.address
property.description: The datanode IPC server address and port. The default is 0.0.0.0:50020

property.name: dfs.namenode.backup.address
property.description: The backup node server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.namenode.backup.http-address
property.description: The backup node http server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period
property.description: The number of seconds between two periodic checkpoints.

property.name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
property.description: The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.
